summary: Makes the Jagged Crown compatible with Dragonplate Armor.
descriptionHtml:
The Jagged Crown goes great with Dragonplate Armor. The only problem? Even though the crown uses dragon bones to improve it, you don\'t get any of the armor bonuses from wearing it with Dragonplate Armor.

This mod changes that. With the right bonuses from the Heavy Armor perk tree, you should get all the bonuses now, risk free :) 

Compatibility issues: Absolutely none as far as I know, unless you have another mod that specifically edits the ArmorMaterial of the Jagged Crown. 

Endorse if you like.
author: YamiMarik1994
